job: Academic Development Center - Mount Royal University
jobBrief: MRU Academic Development Center promtes excellence in teaching and learning by providing a range of services to faculty and staff. The center provides a variety of services to support the development of teaching and learning at MRU. Some support services include the use of technologies, curriculumn setup in the D2L learning management software system,
title: D2L Migration Support Analyst
tasks: Provided support to faculty and students in the transition to D2L Brightspace
Resolved +20 tickets and in-person visits a day through effective communication and troubleshooting issues by thoroughly checking course shell settings and file associations.
Educate faculty and students on the functions of D2L for the transition from BlackBoard
Assist and educate professors with external applications such as Google Calendar and Microsoft 365 applications

jobBrief: Costco is a membership warehouse club, dedicated to bringing their members the best possible prices on quality brand-name merchandise. With more than 700 warehouses, Costco provides a wide selection of merchandise, plus the convenience of specialty departments and exclusive member services, all designed to make your shopping experience a pleasurable one.
title: Tire Installer
tasks: Completed assigned service for up to 5 vehicles within an hour
Provided services to customer cehicles such as mounting, balancing, rotations, and flat repairs.
Ensured the customer was satisfied with the service and their vehicle was safe to drive
Communicated with customers to ensure they were aware of the process and time it would take
Completed tasks in a timely manner to ensure the customer was not waiting
Used tire shop equipment in a safe manner while maintaining a clean work environment

jobBrief: Ghost Armor is a manufacturer, distributor, and reseller of electronic protection products. The company offers screen protectors and cases for electronic devices such as smartphones, tablets, laptops and handheld consoles.
title: Sales Associate
tasks: Provided exceptional customer service to customers in store and over the phone
Communicated with customers to ensure they were aware of the process and time it would take
Completed tasks in a timely manner to ensure the customer was not waiting
Applied customer service experience and marketing concepts to promote the company's products
Applied various types of device protection for up to seven devices at a time
Worked independently balancing multiple tasks including transactions, protection applications, and customer service

jobBrief: Code Ninjas is a coding and STEM education franchise that teaches kids ages 7-14 how to code through fun, game-based lessons. Code Ninjas offers a variety of programs, including after-school classes, birthday parties, camps, and more.
title: Sensei
tasks: Taught and supervised classrooms of up to 16 kids at a time
Regularly presented new programming topics to children through presentations, hands on projects, and demonstrations
Took initiative to implement ideas around the classroom to enhance the experience for students
Created a systems analysis of all organizational emails and how they connect to current systems in place
Extracted customer data and plans to cleanse and visualize information through power bi
Created transactions and scripts through onflow blockchain

jobBrief: Centennial Foodservice is a foodservice distributor that provides a wide range of products and services to the foodservice industry. The company offers a variety of products, including meat, seafood, dairy, produce, frozen foods, and more.
title: Order Assembler
tasks: Organized orders and quality control to ensure time was spent efficiently Independently analyze orders and locate products to be delivered
Ensured products are up to standards and customers received the correct items along with any specific instructions

With more than 700 warehouses, Costco provides a wide selection of merchandise, plus the convenience of specialty departments and exclusive member services, all designed to make your shopping experience a pleasurable one.
title: Night Stocker
tasks: Organized, planned, and rearranged new merchandise to display every product for the following day

jobBrief: Enerje Café was a local bubble tea and wings shop that provides a variety of (non alcoholic) drinks and food options to the community.
title: Server/Barista
tasks: Utilizing a strong organizational ability to serve a minimum of five tables at once
Applied listening to satisfied Accommodated menu items to fit the guest's dietary needs

title: Server
